scenes.caption: a cartoon cat is flying through the air in front of a ceiling fan
scenes.recaption: an orange cat wearing a diaper is flying through the air in front of a white ceiling fan with four blades. the cat has its eyes closed and its arms and legs are outstretched.

scenes.caption: a pregnant woman in a kitchen preparing food
scenes.recaption: A pregnant woman in a kitchen preparing food. She is wearing a grey t-shirt and black leggings. The woman has long brown hair and is wearing a silver necklace. She is standing in front of a wooden cutting board and is using a knife to cut butter. There is a bowl of butter on the cutting board. In the background, there is a counter with a sink and a window. On the counter is a bag of sugar and a measuring cup.

scenes.caption: a man standing in front of a drum set
scenes.recaption: a young man with short brown hair and glasses is standing on a stage in front of a large red TEDx logo. he is wearing a gray t-shirt and jeans. there is a drum set behind him.

scenes.caption: a man driving a car with a woman sitting next to him
scenes.recaption: Two people in a car. The man is driving and the woman is in the passenger seat. They both have smiles on their faces. The man is wearing a black t-shirt and the woman is wearing a white shirt. The car is a grey lamborghini.

scenes.caption: a man and a woman are talking to each other
scenes.recaption: a man and a woman are recording a podcast. they are both wearing headphones and looking at each other. the woman has long red hair and the man has short brown hair. they are sitting in a room with a lot of bookshelves.

scenes.caption: two men sitting in the back seat of a car
scenes.recaption: Two men are sitting in the front seats of a car. The man in the driver's seat is wearing a black t-shirt and sunglasses. He has a beard and his hair is short and dark. The man in the passenger's seat is wearing a black t-shirt. He has short dark hair and is clean-shaven. The car is a black Ford Mustang.

scenes.caption: a group of women sitting at a table
scenes.recaption: Three people are sitting around a table having a discussion. There are various items on the table including food, drinks, and gift boxes. The woman at the left of the screen has brown hair. She is wearing a black sleeveless top with a white collar and black pants. She is holding a pink box with a white bow. The woman in the middle has bright pink hair. She is wearing a black jacket with a pink bow on the lapel. She is holding a clear plastic box with a pink bow. The man at the right of the screen has short black hair. He is wearing a black shirt and black pants. He is holding a small white box.

scenes.caption: two men sitting in the driver's seat of a car
scenes.recaption: two men in a car. the man in the driver's seat has his hand on the steering wheel and is looking at the road. the man in the passenger's seat is looking at the driver. they are both wearing sunglasses.

scenes.caption: a person holding up a bag of chocolate treats
scenes.recaption: A person of color is holding a bag of chocolate treats. The bag is white with red and green stripes at the top. There is a clear plastic window on the front of the bag. The treats inside the bag are dark brown and round. They are arranged in a circle around the edge of the bag. The bag is labeled "Chocolat" and has a picture of a coffee cup on it.

scenes.caption: a woman in a red dress holding a piece of paper
scenes.recaption: a woman with curly hair in a red off-the-shoulder dress is sitting on a couch and reading a piece of paper. she has a serious expression on her face. there are heart-shaped decorations on the wall behind her.

scenes.caption: a man standing in front of a drum set
scenes.recaption: a young man with glasses, dark hair, and a black t-shirt standing on a stage in front of a large red TED sign. he is holding a pair of drumsticks and is speaking into a microphone. there is a drum set behind him.

scenes.caption: two men standing next to a jeep on a dirt road
scenes.recaption: two men standing next to a black suburban on a rocky dirt road. the men are wearing black and grey t-shirts and cargo pants. the suburban has a brush guard on the front and a roof rack on top. there are trees and rocks in the background.

scenes.caption: a sign that says "bretagne" with a train in the background
scenes.recaption: There is a Bretagne sign in the foreground with a city sign partially visible behind it. A train is in the background.

scenes.caption: two men sitting in the back seat of a car
scenes.recaption: Two men are sitting in the front seats of a car. The man in the driver's seat is wearing a black t-shirt and sunglasses. The car is a black Ford Mustang.

scenes.caption: three women sitting at a table with a bunch of stuff on it
scenes.recaption: there are three people sitting around a table with a clear glass top. there are several gift bags and boxes, a laptop, and other items on the table. the woman on the left has short brown hair, the woman in the middle has bright pink hair, and the man on the right has short black hair. they are all wearing casual clothes.

scenes.caption: a group of people sitting at a table
